title: ''Your account is in the process of transfer''
body:
My EUW profile (summoner name:MrBaikko) is completely locked now and im not able to log in with it (on the league of legends website or in application), i keep on getting the same message about a account transfer and I haven't yet gotten a reply from riot support. I have used a hefty amount of money on this game and would not want to lose everything because of a hijack.
Please im begging for quick help on this issue.

replies.body: I wasn't able to locate a ticket for this. If you have a ticket #number, I'll be happy to check on your status.  Let me know!

i have the same problem with my other account on EUW 

this is my ticket No; #30897657
Same with me, my account is being trasnferred and my bank account was hit with RP purchases and no response from Riot games. NA account Darkchaotix
It seems like they sent RP to themselves as a gift and then changed my region so I can't find out who.
I just checked my bank far too late and someone has purchased RP on my account too, and it's being transferred now.
